means: （宗教节日或假日的）前日，前夕( eve的名词复数 )
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 伊夫斯取自母名，来源于Eve,含义是“伊夫之子”(son of Eve)
[地名] [赤道几内亚] 埃韦斯

sentence.Network_en: On Christmas Eves we go to Grandma's home.
sentence.Network_cn: 每当圣诞前夕我们都到祖母家去.

sentence.Network_en: On hearing what the obstetrician had said, she shut her eves with relief.
sentence.Network_cn: 她听见了医生的话, 眼珠一转,眼泪涌了出来.

sentence.Network_en: Dear Mrs. Eves, I'm sending attached your receipt.
sentence.Network_cn: 亲爱的伊夫太太, 我给您发了封信,收据以附件形式附上了.

list.abs: 明天就是万圣节前夜（Halloween Eve）了，为了应景，赶紧做了一个鬼脸面包，灵感来自悲伤哈欠的“番茄迷迭香意大利香料面包， …
how will you spend christmas eve ., 你要如何度过圣诞夜.
woman knocks down pope at christmas eve mass., 在圣诞前夕弥撒有个女子击倒了教皇.
时尚美人所有馆主 ... CANUS 肯拿士 Summer eve 舒摩儿 RENACHRIS-- 水晶发饰.
【品牌大全】欧美,日韩,中国化妆品品牌-闺蜜网 ... 夏士莲( Hazeline) 夏依( Summer's EVE) 谢馥春( XIEFUCHUN).

entry.tran: 前夕;前一天；前一段时间
entry.def: The eve of a particular event or occasion is the day before it, or the period of time just before it.

auth_sentence.content: Other conversations, on other New Year's Eves, were never mentioned again.

auth_sentence.content: And Dr Eves points out that meteorites are falling to Earth all the time.

auth_sentence.content: Brent Wilson had the try line beckoning but could not gather Manning's cross-field after more dynamic running from Eves.
